official_title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act with respect to the status of professional standards review organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act to provide that a Professional Standards Review Organization shall not be considered an authority of the United States Government for the purposes of the Administrative Procedure Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act with respect to the status of professional standards review organizations.
